languages.text: "В этом есть смысл. Опасны те, кто молчит о том, что еще не принял Великого Светоча как истинного владыку".

traits.locale_text: "В этом есть смысл. Опасны те, кто молчит о том, что еще не принял Великого Светоча как истинного владыку".

languages.text: "It makes sense. There is a danger in those who do not openly accept the Great Beacon as their true {mf|master|mistress}."
languages.original_text: "В этом есть смысл. Опасны те, кто молчит о том, что еще не принял Великого Светоча как истинного владыку".

traits.locale_text: "It makes sense. There is a danger in those who keep quiet about not accepting the Great Beacon as their true lord yet."
"It makes sense. There is a danger in those who keep quiet about not accepting the Great Beacon as their true lord yet."
"It makes sense. There is a danger in those who do not openly accept the Exalted Beacon as their true lord."
"It makes sense. There is a danger in those who do not openly accept the Exalted Beacon as their true lord."
"It makes sense. There is a danger in those who do not openly accept the Great Beacon as their true {mf|master|mistress}."

languages.text: “这也难怪，毕竟那些不肯公开承认至高明光为真正主人的家伙，确实会遭遇不测。”
languages.original_text: "It makes sense. There is a danger in those who do not openly accept the Great Beacon as their true {mf|master|mistress}."

traits.locale_text: “这也难怪，毕竟那些不肯公开承认至高明光为真正主人的家伙，确实会遭遇不测。”

languages.text: « C'est logique. Ceux qui ne reconnaissent pas {mf|le|la} Guide comme leur véritable {mf|maître|maîtresse} représentent un véritable danger. »
languages.original_text: "It makes sense. There is a danger in those who do not openly accept the Great Beacon as their true {mf|master|mistress}."

traits.locale_text: « C'est logique. Ceux qui ne reconnaissent pas {mf|le|la} Guide comme leur véritable {mf|maître|maîtresse} représentent un véritable danger. »

languages.text: 「なるほどね。大いなる烽火を真の主として公に受け容れてない奴らに、危険が潜んでるってわけか」
languages.original_text: "It makes sense. There is a danger in those who do not openly accept the Great Beacon as their true {mf|master|mistress}."

traits.locale_text: 「なるほどね。大いなる烽火を真の主として公に受け容れてない奴らに、危険が潜んでるってわけか」

languages.text: «Tiene sentido. Quienes no aceptan al Gran Faro como su verdader{mf|o|a} am{mf|o|a} son peligrosos».
languages.original_text: "It makes sense. There is a danger in those who do not openly accept the Great Beacon as their true {mf|master|mistress}."

traits.locale_text: «Tiene sentido. Quienes no aceptan al Gran Faro como su verdader{mf|o|a} am{mf|o|a} son peligrosos».

languages.text: "Verständlich. Jene, die das Strahlende Licht nicht offen als {mf|ihren wahren Meister|ihre wahre Meisterin}akzeptieren, sind gefährlich."
languages.original_text: "It makes sense. There is a danger in those who do not openly accept the Great Beacon as their true {mf|master|mistress}."

traits.locale_text: "Verständlich. Jene, die das Strahlende Licht nicht offen als {mf|ihren wahren Meister|ihre wahre Meisterin}akzeptieren, sind gefährlich."
"Verständlich. Es geht eine Gefahr aus von jenen, die das Erhabene Licht nicht offen als ihren wahren Herrn akzeptieren."

languages.text: "Makul. Yüce Kılavuz'u gerçek efendisi olarak kabul ettiğini beyan etmeyenler tehlikelidir."
languages.original_text: "It makes sense. There is a danger in those who do not openly accept the Great Beacon as their true {mf|master|mistress}."
